title: Unpopular Opinion: Guardian Angel is a really stupid item
body:
Although I am sure everyone agrees its not overwhelmingly strong, the item is still really stupid to play against

Seeing that white circle around an enemy champion is so demotivating, and tempts you to completely ignore them, as they are invincible, and require so many resources to take down

To fix it, I think the resurrection time should be lowered down to a second or less, that way they don't have the ability to suicide and become immune to damage for so long. This way, it saves them from death, but its no longer such a large nuisance to deal with, as it becomes less of a hassle to focus an enemy with GA

replies.body: Or we could make it a complete defensive item again and not a defensive/damage item.

Ok, name one reason APs are better than ADs, I'm listening.

I mean I'd be fine with Zhonya's being removed/made defensive.  Then the game wouldn't be balanced around the assumption of it ({{champion:238}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:85}}).

so tanks start rushing it second item again?

no

No tank other than maybe Sion has the scaling to be able to rush GA second.

Given that it gives no health, no CDR, and is only useful past the 30 minute mark to tanks where they would need it to survive more than 3-4 seconds in a teamfight once carries have the damage to kill them
wow you don't remember Cinderhulk GA Gragas jungle do you?

I feel like the response to tanks rushing GA was completely wrong.

Historically you wouldn't build GA or Thornmail on a tank, because it would discourage opponents from focusing you, and you wanted them to focus you, because then you'd win.

When GA was being spammed by tanks, it was because teams could freelh focus tabks and blow them the fuck up, without having to use much in the way of cooldown or dps that should be saved for carries. Tanks were buying a carry defensive item because they were dying so fucking fast, and riot was like "This won't do at all! Let's take it away from them."
So we're back to adc becoming tanky & tanks having two life for no reason

Guardian Angel was more balanced when it was a purely defensive ítem. 

Now buying it with an AP champion is borderline trolling, while every ADC buys it at some point of the game because "why not?"

It was changed so tanks couldn't have it. Now look at them. If you aren't Sion, you just die in 3 seconds with that 200+ resists you bought. LW items need nerfs (in the pen part), and Void needs a 5% nerf to its pen. It feels like Pen just overwrites defensive stats when it should allow you to do some more damage to a defensive target, not bludgeon them in one round of spells. Burst has a part to be blamed with this, but the amount of pen in the game just allows for defensive stats to be thrown out the window.
lol tanks are so weak so they see competitive play lul

Yeah, and thats it. The point? 
Sure, I should have mentioned soloqueue, but I mainly dont look to pro play as a reason why tanks should be buffed or nerfed. Its a dumb idea. Maokai can just be shreaded in an instant, Ornn gets blasted to bits, Cho even though he can stack health, just gets shreaded as well. So why is Sion the only good tank? Simple, easier health stack and a big ass shield to boot.
they see play in comp because tanks there have brains and can use their champ instead of suiciding by going 1v5 like the boards want them to be able to

Or its the fact pro play can utilize tanks better than soloqueue because you have teammates that you can trust to not suicide and do stupid shit. This entire meta and pen itemiztion is the reason why tanks are bad in soloplay if they are not Sion. People that don't like playing burst champs are forced beyond their will to play them if they want to climb, and im not saying be able to pick a tank here or there, just playing straight burst and for that tank, Sion. Even then Sion isn't a 100% win.

The main issue is solo agency, which the tank class lost in preseason and midseason. Tank tops are basically another word for "Second Support". You can peel as hard as you want, but if your teammates are dumb and die for bad positioning or play, you are basically stuck being able to change nothing of the situation because by that time, you are either low or dead from all the damage in the game that goes through resists.

If  cooldowns are frozen during Zhonya's stasis and Zilean ultimate stasis also.

That's a bad idea. There are some champions which rely on delayed damage and don't want it to activate on death, eg. Heimer wants a on-demand stasis, but wouldn't want a resurrection. Also, that would mean the effect has to have a lot higher cd, which would make it useless vs stuff like Zed or Fizz.
That's literally why he said that.
No. I said "I don't agree with Zhonya working like ap GA", while he said "I agree, but make it freeze the champ's CDs while affected by the effect". It's pretty much the opposite.
Ah nvm got lost in comment chains. He just had no clue how much more powerful on-demand stasis is vs revive stasis then.

Yeah, that is an unpopular opinion unlike most threads with titles like this...  I personally disagree because I think we need more items like GA which provide utility/protection to carries instead of pure multiplicative offense or sustain that scales with offense (lifesteal).
